events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit as expected. I would like to request a refund or exchange as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to size mismatch and customer dissatisfaction.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request and assist the customer accordingly.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund or exchange request.
Could you please provide the order number and let us know if the item is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 5566778899. The jacket is unused and still in the original packaging, ready for return.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund as soon as we receive the returned jacket. I will email you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate receiving the return label so I can send the jacket back without delay.
The return label has been emailed to you. Once we receive the jacket, your refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you were able to send back the jacket and that the refund process is on track.
We have received your returned jacket and completed your refund. Please reach out if you need further assistance.
